content.body: I was gonna look at Bikeshed for inspiration, but it seems it might still put these all in the same namespace and the reason it didn't cause a problem is because the instance `json()` is on the `Body` interface.

content.body: We should have just called the static method fromJSON 😅

As far as MDN goes, I am thankful that for the JavaScript docs at least, the titles/names and URLs for methods were done right from the beginning — so there’s no problem to fix there

That said, there’s also been some suggestion that when (if) the title/name/URL changes get made to the API pages, then the JavaScript pages should also be changed to match what ends up being done for the API pages…
